description: Users may experience unexpected loss of access to certain system resources after installing the security update associated with KB5032190 and KB5032192. This applies to various Windows 11 builds, specifically 10.0.22621.2715 for versions 23H2 and 22H2, and 10.0.22000.2600 for version 21H2. The impact could manifest as difficulties in accessing files or services managed by the affected components, resulting from elevated privileges potentially being mismanaged.
